page.title: 05AT WORK IN GLENLUCE
page.content: Within our school we found that 4% of fathers were unemployed and that the unemployment rate in our D_block is average for this area.In{Glenluce} village local hotels provide work for some villagers,as do four builders,an engineering plant and some farmers who employ teenagers on {Youth Training {Schemes.}Some women in Glenluce do some type of domestic work.Other people work in nearby Stranraer. The { {arts and crafts }are typical of a rural area. Knitting,sewing, toymaking and floral art are widespread. Less frequent are{leather and horn craft and{wood carving.}Few blacksmiths are left in rural areas but our local smiddy not only makes and shoes horses but produces{wrought iron work.}The village also has a{taxidermist,}a bit of a rarity, and he also produces polished blackthorn walking sticks.
